description:
A Jolteon belonging to the Instructor at the Pok√©mon League entrance exam.
Jolteon was used by the Intructor to battle Ash who was using an Arbok which he has randomly choosen.
Jolteon was paralyzed by Arbok`s Glare attack but Ash made a mistake when he attempted to use wrap on Jolteon with its spikey mane. Jolteon used Thunder on Arbok and Ash was forced to switch to Meowth.
name: Thunders (Kyoukan)
